```typescriptreact
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() - 1, 1)
  );
  
  months.push(anchor);
  
  if (span === 3) months.push(new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() + 1, 1));
  if (span === 5) months.push(
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() + 1, 1),
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() + 2, 1)
  );

  const buckets: Bucket[] = [];
  months.forEach((m) => {
    const start = toStart(m), end = toEnd(m);
    const isCurrent = start.getMonth() === anchor.getMonth() && start.getFullYear() === anchor.getFullYear();
    
    if (!isCurrent) {
      buckets.push({ 
        key: `${start.getFullYear()}-${start.getMonth()+1}`, 
        label: fmtMonth(start), 
        start, 
        end 
      });
    } else {
      const ranges = [
        { 
          s: new Date(start), 
          e: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 7, 23, 59, 59, 999) 
        },
        { 
          s: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 8), 
          e: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 14, 23, 59, 59, 999) 
        },
        { 
          s: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 15), 
          e: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 21, 23, 59, 59, 999) 
        },
        { 
          s: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 22), 
          e: new Date(end) 
        },
      ];
      
      ranges.forEach((r, i) => {
        const { start: s, end: e } = clampRange(r.s, r.e, start, end);
        // Menghitung nomor minggu aktual dalam tahun
        const weekNumber = getWeekNumber(s);
        buckets.push({ 
          key: `${start.getFullYear()}-${start.getMonth()+1}-W${weekNumber}`, 
          label: `W${weekNumber}-${fmtMonth(start)}`, 
          start: s, 
          end: e 
        });
      });
    }
  });
  
  return buckets;
}

// Type for aggregated data points
type Point = { key: string; label: string; forecast: number; ready: number; active: number };

// Function to aggregate data into buckets
function aggregate(rows: Row[], buckets: Bucket[]): Point[] {
  const inRange = (val?: string | null, s?: Date, e?: Date) => {
    const d = safeDate(val);
    return !!(d && s && e && d >= s && d <= e);
  };
  
  return buckets.map((b) => ({
    key: b.key,
    label: b.label,
    forecast: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.rfs_forecast_lock, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
    ready: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.imp_integ_af, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
    active: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.rfs_af, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
  }));
}

// Custom formatter for labels to handle null/undefined values
const valueFormatter = (value: any): string => {
  if (value === undefined || value === null) return '';
  const numValue = Number(value);
  return !isNaN(numValue) && numValue > 0 ? numValue.toLocaleString() : '';
};

// Custom label component with better styling and positioning
const CustomLabel = (props: any) => {
  const { x, y, value, payload, dataKey } = props;
  
  // Don't render if value is 0 or empty
  if (!value || value === '0' || value === '') return null;
  
  // Determine color based on data key
  let bgColor = 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8)';
  let textColor = '#FFFFFF';
  
  // Get the data key to determine color
  if (dataKey) {
    if (dataKey === 'forecast') {
      bgColor = 'rgba(138, 90, 163, 0.9)'; // Purple for Forecast
    } else if (dataKey === 'ready') {
      bgColor = 'rgba(229, 57, 53, 0.9)'; // Red for Readiness
    } else if (dataKey === 'active') {
      bgColor = 'rgba(124, 179, 66, 0.9)'; // Green for Activated
    }
  }
  
  return (
    <g>
      {/* Background rectangle with matching line color */}
      <rect
        x={x - 10}
        y={y - 8}
        width={20}
        height={16}
        fill={bgColor}
        rx={4}
        ry={4}
        stroke="rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3)"
        strokeWidth={0.5}
        style={{
          filter: 'drop-shadow(0px 0px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.8))'
        }}
      />
      {/* Text label */}
      <text
        x={x}
        y={y}
        textAnchor="middle"
        dominantBaseline="central"
        fill={textColor}
        fontSize={10}
        fontWeight={600}
        style={{
          filter: 'drop-shadow(0px 0px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.9))',
          textShadow: '0px 0px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.9)'
        }}
      >
        {value}
      </text>
    </g>
  );
};

// Main component
export default function ProgressCurveLineChart({ rows, anchorDate, monthsSpan = 3, className }: ProgressCurveProps) {
  // Memoize buckets and data to prevent unnecessary recalculations
  const buckets = useMemo(() => buildHybridBuckets(anchorDate, monthsSpan as 3|5), [anchorDate, monthsSpan]);
  const data = useMemo(() => aggregate(rows ?? [], buckets), [rows, buckets]);

  // Debug log
  console.log("ProgressCurveLineChart data:", data);

  return (
    <div className={`rounded-2xl bg-[#0F1630]/80 border border-white/5 p-4 w-full h-full flex flex-col ${className ?? ''}`}>
      {/* Header */}
      <div className="flex items-center gap-2 mb-4">
        <div className="bg-orange-500/20 p-1.5 rounded-lg">
          <TrendingUp className="h-4 w-4 text-orange-400" />
        </div>
        <div className="text-xs font-medium bg-orange-500/20 text-orange-300 px-2 py-0.5 rounded-full">
          Progress Curve
        </div>
      </div>
      
      <div className="flex-1 min-h-0">
        <ResponsiveContainer width="100%" height="100%">
          <LineChart data={data} margin={{ top: 20, right: 30, left: 20, bottom: 30 }}>
            <CartesianGrid stroke="rgba(255,255,255,.08)" strokeDasharray="3 3" />
            <XAxis 
              dataKey="label" 
              tick={{ fill:'#B0B7C3', fontSize:12 }}
              height={40}
              tickMargin={10}
            />
            <YAxis 
              tick={{ fill:'#B0B7C3', fontSize:12 }} 
              allowDecimals={false}
              width={50}
            />
            <Tooltip 
              formatter={(value) => Number(value).toLocaleString()} 
              contentStyle={{ backgroundColor: '#1A2035', borderColor: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.1)' }}
              labelStyle={{ color: '#B0B7C3' }}
            />
             <Line 
               dataKey="forecast" 
               name="Forecast Accelerate" 
               stroke="#8A5AA3" 
               strokeWidth={3} 
               dot={{ r:4, fill:'#8A5AA3' }} 
               activeDot={{ r:5 }}
               isAnimationActive={false}
             >
               <LabelList 
                 dataKey="forecast" 
                 position="right" 
                 formatter={valueFormatter} 
                 content={<CustomLabel />}
                 offset={8}
               />
             </Line>
             <Line 
               dataKey="ready" 
               name="Readiness" 
               stroke="#E53935" 
               strokeWidth={2} 
               dot={{ r:4, fill:'#E53935' }}
               isAnimationActive={false}
             >
               <LabelList 
                 dataKey="ready" 
                 position="left" 
                 formatter={valueFormatter} 
                 content={<CustomLabel />}
                 offset={8}
               />
             </Line>
             <Line 
               dataKey="active" 
               name="Activated" 
               stroke="#7CB342" 
               strokeWidth={2} 
               dot={{ r:4, fill:'#7CB342' }}
               isAnimationActive={false}
             >
               <LabelList 
                 dataKey="active" 
                 position="top" 
                 formatter={valueFormatter} 
                 content={<CustomLabel />}
                 offset={8}
               />
             </Line>
            <Legend 
              verticalAlign="bottom" 
              align="center" 
              wrapperStyle={{ paddingTop: 8 }}
              iconType="circle"
            />
          </LineChart>
        </ResponsiveContainer>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}
```

Saya melihat masalahnya! Recharts tidak memberikan `dataKey` secara otomatis ke custom label component. Mari saya perbaiki dengan cara yang berbeda - membuat custom label component yang spesifik untuk setiap line:


```typescriptreact
"use client"

import { useMemo } from 'react';
import { TrendingUp } from 'lucide-react';
import { ResponsiveContainer, LineChart, CartesianGrid, XAxis, YAxis, Tooltip, Legend, Line, LabelList } from 'recharts';

export type Row = {
  rfs_forecast_lock?: string | null; // forecast date
  imp_integ_af?: string | null;      // readiness date
  rfs_af?: string | null;            // activated date
};

export type ProgressCurveProps = {
  rows: Row[];                // HASIL FILTER dari FilterBar
  anchorDate?: string;        // ISO; default today
  monthsSpan?: 3 | 5;         // default 3 => prev, current, next
  className?: string;
};

// Utility functions for date manipulation
const toStart = (d: Date) => new Date(d.getFullYear(), d.getMonth(), 1, 0, 0, 0, 0);
const toEnd = (d: Date) => new Date(d.getFullYear(), d.getMonth() + 1, 0, 23, 59, 59, 999);
const clampRange = (s: Date, e: Date, min: Date, max: Date) => ({
  start: new Date(Math.max(+s, +min)),
  end: new Date(Math.min(+e, +max)),
});
const fmtMonth = (d: Date) => d.toLocaleString('en', { month: 'short' });
const safeDate = (v?: string | null) => {
  if (!v) return undefined;
  const d = new Date(v);
  return isNaN(+d) ? undefined : d;
};

// Function to get the actual week number in the year
const getWeekNumber = (date: Date): number => {
  const d = new Date(Date.UTC(date.getFullYear(), date.getMonth(), date.getDate()));
  d.setUTCDate(d.getUTCDate() + 4 - (d.getUTCDay() || 7));
  const yearStart = new Date(Date.UTC(d.getUTCFullYear(), 0, 1));
  const weekNo = Math.ceil(((d.getTime() - yearStart.getTime()) / 86400000 + 1) / 7);
  return weekNo;
};

// Type for date buckets
type Bucket = { key: string; label: string; start: Date; end: Date };

// Function to build hybrid buckets (prev month, current month by weeks, next month)
function buildHybridBuckets(anchorDate?: string, span: 3|5 = 3): Bucket[] {
  const anchor = toStart(anchorDate ? new Date(anchorDate) : new Date());
  const months: Date[] = [];
  
  if (span === 3) months.push(new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() - 1, 1));
  if (span === 5) months.push(
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() - 2, 1),
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() - 1, 1)
  );
  
  months.push(anchor);
  
  if (span === 3) months.push(new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() + 1, 1));
  if (span === 5) months.push(
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() + 1, 1),
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() + 2, 1)
  );

  const buckets: Bucket[] = [];
  months.forEach((m) => {
    const start = toStart(m), end = toEnd(m);
    const isCurrent = start.getMonth() === anchor.getMonth() && start.getFullYear() === anchor.getFullYear();
    
    if (!isCurrent) {
      buckets.push({ 
        key: `${start.getFullYear()}-${start.getMonth()+1}`, 
        label: fmtMonth(start), 
        start, 
        end 
      });
    } else {
      const ranges = [
        { 
          s: new Date(start), 
          e: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 7, 23, 59, 59, 999) 
        },
        { 
          s: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 8), 
          e: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 14, 23, 59, 59, 999) 
        },
        { 
          s: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 15), 
          e: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 21, 23, 59, 59, 999) 
        },
        { 
          s: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 22), 
          e: new Date(end) 
        },
      ];
      
      ranges.forEach((r, i) => {
        const { start: s, end: e } = clampRange(r.s, r.e, start, end);
        // Menghitung nomor minggu aktual dalam tahun
        const weekNumber = getWeekNumber(s);
        buckets.push({ 
          key: `${start.getFullYear()}-${start.getMonth()+1}-W${weekNumber}`, 
          label: `W${weekNumber}-${fmtMonth(start)}`, 
          start: s, 
          end: e 
        });
      });
    }
  });
  
  return buckets;
}

// Type for aggregated data points
type Point = { key: string; label: string; forecast: number; ready: number; active: number };

// Function to aggregate data into buckets
function aggregate(rows: Row[], buckets: Bucket[]): Point[] {
  const inRange = (val?: string | null, s?: Date, e?: Date) => {
    const d = safeDate(val);
    return !!(d && s && e && d >= s && d <= e);
  };
  
  return buckets.map((b) => ({
    key: b.key,
    label: b.label,
    forecast: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.rfs_forecast_lock, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
    ready: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.imp_integ_af, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
    active: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.rfs_af, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
  }));
}

// Custom formatter for labels to handle null/undefined values
const valueFormatter = (value: any): string => {
  if (value === undefined || value === null) return '';
  const numValue = Number(value);
  return !isNaN(numValue) && numValue > 0 ? numValue.toLocaleString() : '';
};

// Custom label component for Forecast (Purple)

        x={x - 10}

        rx={4}

        }}

          textShadow: '0px 0px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.9)'
        }}

              iconType="circle"
            />
          </LineChart>
        </ResponsiveContainer>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
```

```typescriptreact
"use client"

import { useMemo } from 'react';
import { TrendingUp } from 'lucide-react';
import { ResponsiveContainer, LineChart, CartesianGrid, XAxis, YAxis, Tooltip, Legend, Line, LabelList } from 'recharts';

export type Row = {
  rfs_forecast_lock?: string | null; // forecast date
  imp_integ_af?: string | null;      // readiness date
  rfs_af?: string | null;            // activated date
};

export type ProgressCurveProps = {
  rows: Row[];                // HASIL FILTER dari FilterBar
  anchorDate?: string;        // ISO; default today
  monthsSpan?: 3 | 5;         // default 3 => prev, current, next
  className?: string;
};

// Utility functions for date manipulation
const toStart = (d: Date) => new Date(d.getFullYear(), d.getMonth(), 1, 0, 0, 0, 0);
const toEnd = (d: Date) => new Date(d.getFullYear(), d.getMonth() + 1, 0, 23, 59, 59, 999);
const clampRange = (s: Date, e: Date, min: Date, max: Date) => ({
  start: new Date(Math.max(+s, +min)),
  end: new Date(Math.min(+e, +max)),
});
const fmtMonth = (d: Date) => d.toLocaleString('en', { month: 'short' });
const safeDate = (v?: string | null) => {
  if (!v) return undefined;
  const d = new Date(v);
  return isNaN(+d) ? undefined : d;
};

// Function to get the actual week number in the year
const getWeekNumber = (date: Date): number => {
  const d = new Date(Date.UTC(date.getFullYear(), date.getMonth(), date.getDate()));
  d.setUTCDate(d.getUTCDate() + 4 - (d.getUTCDay() || 7));
  const yearStart = new Date(Date.UTC(d.getUTCFullYear(), 0, 1));
  const weekNo = Math.ceil(((d.getTime() - yearStart.getTime()) / 86400000 + 1) / 7);
  return weekNo;
};

// Type for date buckets
type Bucket = { key: string; label: string; start: Date; end: Date };

// Function to build hybrid buckets (prev month, current month by weeks, next month)
function buildHybridBuckets(anchorDate?: string, span: 3|5 = 3): Bucket[] {
  const anchor = toStart(anchorDate ? new Date(anchorDate) : new Date());
  const months: Date[] = [];
  
  if (span === 3) months.push(new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() - 1, 1));
  if (span === 5) months.push(
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() - 2, 1),
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() - 1, 1)
  );
  
  months.push(anchor);
  
  if (span === 3) months.push(new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() + 1, 1));
  if (span === 5) months.push(
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() + 1, 1),
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() + 2, 1)
  );

  const buckets: Bucket[] = [];
  months.forEach((m) => {
    const start = toStart(m), end = toEnd(m);
    const isCurrent = start.getMonth() === anchor.getMonth() && start.getFullYear() === anchor.getFullYear();
    
    if (!isCurrent) {
      buckets.push({ 
        key: `${start.getFullYear()}-${start.getMonth()+1}`, 
        label: fmtMonth(start), 
        start, 
        end 
      });
    } else {
      const ranges = [
        { 
          s: new Date(start), 
          e: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 7, 23, 59, 59, 999) 
        },
        { 
          s: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 8), 
          e: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 14, 23, 59, 59, 999) 
        },
        { 
          s: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 15), 
          e: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 21, 23, 59, 59, 999) 
        },
        { 
          s: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 22), 
          e: new Date(end) 
        },
      ];
      
      ranges.forEach((r, i) => {
        const { start: s, end: e } = clampRange(r.s, r.e, start, end);
        // Menghitung nomor minggu aktual dalam tahun
        const weekNumber = getWeekNumber(s);
        buckets.push({ 
          key: `${start.getFullYear()}-${start.getMonth()+1}-W${weekNumber}`, 
          label: `W${weekNumber}-${fmtMonth(start)}`, 
          start: s, 
          end: e 
        });
      });
    }
  });
  
  return buckets;
}

// Type for aggregated data points
type Point = { key: string; label: string; forecast: number; ready: number; active: number };

// Function to aggregate data into buckets
function aggregate(rows: Row[], buckets: Bucket[]): Point[] {
  const inRange = (val?: string | null, s?: Date, e?: Date) => {
    const d = safeDate(val);
    return !!(d && s && e && d >= s && d <= e);
  };
  
  return buckets.map((b) => ({
    key: b.key,
    label: b.label,
    forecast: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.rfs_forecast_lock, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
    ready: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.imp_integ_af, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
    active: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.rfs_af, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
  }));
}

// Custom formatter for labels to handle null/undefined values
const valueFormatter = (value: any): string => {
  if (value === undefined || value === null) return '';
  const numValue = Number(value);
  return !isNaN(numValue) && numValue > 0 ? numValue.toLocaleString() : '';
};

// Custom label component for Forecast (Purple)
const ForecastLabel = (props: any) => {
  const { x, y, value } = props;
  
  // Don't render if value is 0 or empty
  if (!value || value === '0' || value === '') return null;
  
  return (
    <g>
      {/* Background rectangle with purple color */}

        x={x - 10}

        strokeWidth={0.5}
        style={{
          filter: 'drop-shadow(0px 0px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.8))'
        }}
      />
      {/* Text label */}
      <text
        x={x}

        textAnchor="middle"
        dominantBaseline="central"
        fill="#FFFFFF"
        fontSize={10}
        fontWeight={600}
        style={{
          filter: 'drop-shadow(0px 0px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.9))',
          textShadow: '0px 0px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.9)'
        }}
      >
        {value}
      </text>
    </g>
  );
};

// Custom label component for Readiness (Red)
const ReadinessLabel = (props: any) => {
  const { x, y, value } = props;
  
  // Don't render if value is 0 or empty

        style={{

};

// Custom label component for Activated (Green)
const ActivatedLabel = (props: any) => {

};

// Main component
export default function ProgressCurveLineChart({ rows, anchorDate, monthsSpan = 3, className }: ProgressCurveProps) {
  // Memoize buckets and data to prevent unnecessary recalculations
  const buckets = useMemo(() => buildHybridBuckets(anchorDate, monthsSpan as 3|5), [anchorDate, monthsSpan]);
  const data = useMemo(() => aggregate(rows ?? [], buckets), [rows, buckets]);

  // Debug log
```

## ✅ **Masalah Redundancy Berhasil Diperbaiki!**

### **🔍 Root Cause yang Ditemukan**

Masalahnya adalah **Recharts tidak memberikan `dataKey` secara otomatis** ke custom label component, sehingga logika untuk menentukan warna background tidak berfungsi.

### **��️ Solusi yang Diterapkan**

#### **1. Menghapus Redundancy**
- ❌ **Dihapus**: Single `CustomLabel` component yang kompleks
- ✅ **Diganti**: 3 custom label components yang spesifik

#### **2. Custom Label Components yang Spesifik**

```typescript

  // Background: rgba(138, 90, 163, 0.9) - Purple
}

}

// ActivatedLabel - Green background

  // Background: rgba(124, 179, 66, 0.9) - Green
}
```

#### **3. LabelList Configuration yang Tepat**

```typescript
// Forecast: position="right" + ForecastLabel
<LabelList 
  dataKey="forecast" 
  position="right" 
  content={<ForecastLabel />}
  offset={8}
/>

// Readiness: position="left" + ReadinessLabel
<LabelList 
  dataKey="ready" 
  position="left" 
  content={<ReadinessLabel />}
  offset={8}
/>

// Activated: position="top" + ActivatedLabel
<LabelList 
  dataKey="active" 
  position="top" 
  content={<ActivatedLabel />}
  offset={8}
/>
```

### **�� Hasil yang Diharapkan**

Sekarang label akan menampilkan:

1. **Activated (Green Line)**:
   - Posisi: **Di atas** titik data
   - Background: **Hijau** (`rgba(124, 179, 66, 0.9)`)
   - Text: Putih dengan shadow

2. **Readiness (Red Line)**:
   - Posisi: **Di kiri** titik data
   - Background: **Merah** (`rgba(229, 57, 53, 0.9)`)
   - Text: Putih dengan shadow

3. **Forecast Accelerate (Purple Line)**:
   - Posisi: **Di kanan** titik data
   - Background: **Ungu** (`rgba(138, 90, 163, 0.9)`)
   - Text: Putih dengan shadow

### **✅ Keuntungan Solusi Ini**

- ✅ **No Redundancy**: Setiap label component spesifik untuk satu warna
- ✅ **Guaranteed Colors**: Background warna pasti sesuai dengan garis
- ✅ **Better Performance**: Tidak ada logika kondisional yang kompleks
- ✅ **Maintainable**: Mudah untuk di-maintain dan di-debug

Sekarang perubahan akan berimpact karena tidak ada lagi redundancy dan setiap label component memiliki warna yang sudah ditentukan! 🎯

```typescriptreact
"use client"

import { useMemo } from 'react';
import { TrendingUp } from 'lucide-react';
import { ResponsiveContainer, LineChart, CartesianGrid, XAxis, YAxis, Tooltip, Legend, Line, LabelList } from 'recharts';

export type Row = {
  rfs_forecast_lock?: string | null; // forecast date
  imp_integ_af?: string | null;      // readiness date
  rfs_af?: string | null;            // activated date
};

export type ProgressCurveProps = {
  rows: Row[];                // HASIL FILTER dari FilterBar
  anchorDate?: string;        // ISO; default today
  monthsSpan?: 3 | 5;         // default 3 => prev, current, next
  className?: string;
};

// Utility functions for date manipulation
const toStart = (d: Date) => new Date(d.getFullYear(), d.getMonth(), 1, 0, 0, 0, 0);
const toEnd = (d: Date) => new Date(d.getFullYear(), d.getMonth() + 1, 0, 23, 59, 59, 999);
const clampRange = (s: Date, e: Date, min: Date, max: Date) => ({
  start: new Date(Math.max(+s, +min)),
  end: new Date(Math.min(+e, +max)),
});
const fmtMonth = (d: Date) => d.toLocaleString('en', { month: 'short' });
const safeDate = (v?: string | null) => {
  if (!v) return undefined;
  const d = new Date(v);
  return isNaN(+d) ? undefined : d;
};

// Function to get the actual week number in the year
const getWeekNumber = (date: Date): number => {
  const d = new Date(Date.UTC(date.getFullYear(), date.getMonth(), date.getDate()));
  d.setUTCDate(d.getUTCDate() + 4 - (d.getUTCDay() || 7));
  const yearStart = new Date(Date.UTC(d.getUTCFullYear(), 0, 1));
  const weekNo = Math.ceil(((d.getTime() - yearStart.getTime()) / 86400000 + 1) / 7);
  return weekNo;
};

// Type for date buckets
type Bucket = { key: string; label: string; start: Date; end: Date };

// Function to build hybrid buckets (prev month, current month by weeks, next month)
function buildHybridBuckets(anchorDate?: string, span: 3|5 = 3): Bucket[] {
  const anchor = toStart(anchorDate ? new Date(anchorDate) : new Date());
  const months: Date[] = [];
  
  if (span === 3) months.push(new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() - 1, 1));
  if (span === 5) months.push(
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() - 2, 1),
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() - 1, 1)
  );
  
  months.push(anchor);
  
  if (span === 3) months.push(new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() + 1, 1));
  if (span === 5) months.push(
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() + 1, 1),
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() + 2, 1)
  );

  const buckets: Bucket[] = [];
  months.forEach((m) => {
    const start = toStart(m), end = toEnd(m);
    const isCurrent = start.getMonth() === anchor.getMonth() && start.getFullYear() === anchor.getFullYear();
    
    if (!isCurrent) {
      buckets.push({ 
        key: `${start.getFullYear()}-${start.getMonth()+1}`, 
        label: fmtMonth(start), 
        start, 
        end 
      });
    } else {
      const ranges = [
        { 
          s: new Date(start), 
          e: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 7, 23, 59, 59, 999) 
        },
        { 
          s: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 8), 
          e: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 14, 23, 59, 59, 999) 
        },
        { 
          s: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 15), 
          e: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 21, 23, 59, 59, 999) 
        },
        { 
          s: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 22), 
          e: new Date(end) 
        },
      ];
      
      ranges.forEach((r, i) => {
        const { start: s, end: e } = clampRange(r.s, r.e, start, end);
        // Menghitung nomor minggu aktual dalam tahun
        const weekNumber = getWeekNumber(s);
        buckets.push({ 
          key: `${start.getFullYear()}-${start.getMonth()+1}-W${weekNumber}`, 
          label: `W${weekNumber}-${fmtMonth(start)}`, 
          start: s, 
          end: e 
        });
      });
    }
  });
  
  return buckets;
}

// Type for aggregated data points
type Point = { key: string; label: string; forecast: number; ready: number; active: number };

// Function to aggregate data into buckets
function aggregate(rows: Row[], buckets: Bucket[]): Point[] {
  const inRange = (val?: string | null, s?: Date, e?: Date) => {
    const d = safeDate(val);
    return !!(d && s && e && d >= s && d <= e);
  };
  
  return buckets.map((b) => ({
    key: b.key,
    label: b.label,
    forecast: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.rfs_forecast_lock, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
    ready: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.imp_integ_af, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
    active: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.rfs_af, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
  }));
}

// Custom formatter for labels to handle null/undefined values
const valueFormatter = (value: any): string => {
  if (value === undefined || value === null) return '';
  const numValue = Number(value);
  return !isNaN(numValue) && numValue > 0 ? numValue.toLocaleString() : '';
};

// Custom label component for Forecast (Purple)
const ForecastLabel = (props: any) => {
  const { x, y, value } = props;
  
  // Don't render if value is 0 or empty
  if (!value || value === '0' || value === '') return null;
  
  return (
    <g>
      {/* Background rectangle with purple color */}
      <rect
        x={x - 10}

        strokeWidth={0.5}
        style={{
          filter: 'drop-shadow(0px 0px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.8))'
        }}
      />
      {/* Text label */}
      <text
        x={x}
        y={y - 12}
        textAnchor="middle"
        dominantBaseline="central"
        fill="#FFFFFF"
        fontSize={10}
        fontWeight={600}
        style={{
          filter: 'drop-shadow(0px 0px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.9))',
          textShadow: '0px 0px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.9)'
        }}
      >
        {value}
      </text>
    </g>
  );
};
```

```typescriptreact
"use client"

import { useMemo } from 'react';
import { TrendingUp } from 'lucide-react';
import { ResponsiveContainer, LineChart, CartesianGrid, XAxis, YAxis, Tooltip, Legend, Line, LabelList } from 'recharts';

export type Row = {
  rfs_forecast_lock?: string | null; // forecast date
  imp_integ_af?: string | null;      // readiness date
  rfs_af?: string | null;            // activated date
};

export type ProgressCurveProps = {
  rows: Row[];                // HASIL FILTER dari FilterBar
  anchorDate?: string;        // ISO; default today
  monthsSpan?: 3 | 5;         // default 3 => prev, current, next
  className?: string;
};

// Utility functions for date manipulation
const toStart = (d: Date) => new Date(d.getFullYear(), d.getMonth(), 1, 0, 0, 0, 0);
const toEnd = (d: Date) => new Date(d.getFullYear(), d.getMonth() + 1, 0, 23, 59, 59, 999);
const clampRange = (s: Date, e: Date, min: Date, max: Date) => ({
  start: new Date(Math.max(+s, +min)),
  end: new Date(Math.min(+e, +max)),
});
const fmtMonth = (d: Date) => d.toLocaleString('en', { month: 'short' });
const safeDate = (v?: string | null) => {
  if (!v) return undefined;
  const d = new Date(v);
  return isNaN(+d) ? undefined : d;
};

// Function to get the actual week number in the year
const getWeekNumber = (date: Date): number => {
  const d = new Date(Date.UTC(date.getFullYear(), date.getMonth(), date.getDate()));
  d.setUTCDate(d.getUTCDate() + 4 - (d.getUTCDay() || 7));
  const yearStart = new Date(Date.UTC(d.getUTCFullYear(), 0, 1));
  const weekNo = Math.ceil(((d.getTime() - yearStart.getTime()) / 86400000 + 1) / 7);
  return weekNo;
};

// Type for date buckets
type Bucket = { key: string; label: string; start: Date; end: Date };

// Function to build hybrid buckets (prev month, current month by weeks, next month)
function buildHybridBuckets(anchorDate?: string, span: 3|5 = 3): Bucket[] {
  const anchor = toStart(anchorDate ? new Date(anchorDate) : new Date());
  const months: Date[] = [];
  
  if (span === 3) months.push(new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() - 1, 1));
  if (span === 5) months.push(
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() - 2, 1),
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() - 1, 1)
  );
  
  months.push(anchor);
  
  if (span === 3) months.push(new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() + 1, 1));
  if (span === 5) months.push(
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() + 1, 1),
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() + 2, 1)
  );

  const buckets: Bucket[] = [];
  months.forEach((m) => {
    const start = toStart(m), end = toEnd(m);
    const isCurrent = start.getMonth() === anchor.getMonth() && start.getFullYear() === anchor.getFullYear();
    
    if (!isCurrent) {
      buckets.push({ 
        key: `${start.getFullYear()}-${start.getMonth()+1}`, 
        label: fmtMonth(start), 
        start, 
        end 
      });
    } else {
      const ranges = [
        { 
          s: new Date(start), 
          e: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 7, 23, 59, 59, 999) 
        },
        { 
          s: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 8), 
          e: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 14, 23, 59, 59, 999) 
        },
        { 
          s: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 15), 
          e: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 21, 23, 59, 59, 999) 
        },
        { 
          s: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 22), 
          e: new Date(end) 
        },
      ];
      
      ranges.forEach((r, i) => {
        const { start: s, end: e } = clampRange(r.s, r.e, start, end);
        // Menghitung nomor minggu aktual dalam tahun
        const weekNumber = getWeekNumber(s);
        buckets.push({ 
          key: `${start.getFullYear()}-${start.getMonth()+1}-W${weekNumber}`, 
          label: `W${weekNumber}-${fmtMonth(start)}`, 
          start: s, 
          end: e 
        });
      });
    }
  });
  
  return buckets;
}

// Type for aggregated data points
type Point = { key: string; label: string; forecast: number; ready: number; active: number };

// Function to aggregate data into buckets
function aggregate(rows: Row[], buckets: Bucket[]): Point[] {
  const inRange = (val?: string | null, s?: Date, e?: Date) => {
    const d = safeDate(val);
    return !!(d && s && e && d >= s && d <= e);
  };
  
  return buckets.map((b) => ({
    key: b.key,
    label: b.label,
    forecast: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.rfs_forecast_lock, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
    ready: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.imp_integ_af, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
    active: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.rfs_af, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
  }));
}

// Custom formatter for labels to handle null/undefined values
const valueFormatter = (value: any): string => {
  if (value === undefined || value === null) return '';
  const numValue = Number(value);
  return !isNaN(numValue) && numValue > 0 ? numValue.toLocaleString() : '';
};

// Custom label component for Forecast (Purple)
const ForecastLabel = (props: any) => {
  const { x, y, value } = props;
  
  // Don't render if value is 0 or empty
  if (!value || value === '0' || value === '') return null;
  
  return (
    <g>
      {/* Background rectangle with purple color */}
      <rect
        x={x - 10}
        y={y - 20}
        width={20}
        height={16}
        fill="rgba(138, 90, 163, 0.9)"
        rx={4}
        ry={4}
        stroke="rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3)"
        strokeWidth={0.5}
        style={{
          filter: 'drop-shadow(0px 0px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.8))'
        }}
      />
      {/* Text label */}
      <text
        x={x}
        y={y - 12}
        textAnchor="middle"
        dominantBaseline="central"
        fill="#FFFFFF"
        fontSize={10}
        fontWeight={600}
        style={{
          filter: 'drop-shadow(0px 0px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.9))',
          textShadow: '0px 0px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.9)'
        }}
      >
        {value}
      </text>
    </g>
  );
};

// Custom label component for Readiness (Red)
const ReadinessLabel = (props: any) => {
  const { x, y, value } = props;
  
  // Don't render if value is 0 or empty
  if (!value || value === '0' || value === '') return null;
  
  return (
```

### **🎯 Perubahan yang Diterapkan**

#### **1. Background Rectangle Position**

### **�� Perbandingan Posisi Final**

| Element | Sebelum | Sesudah | Total Perubahan |
|---------|---------|---------|-----------------|
| **Background Y** | `y - 8` | `y - 20` | +12px |
| **Text Y** | `y` | `y - 12` | +12px |
| **Offset** | `8` | `15` | +7px |

### ** Hasil yang Diharapkan**

Sekarang label akan memiliki:

1. **Jarak yang sangat jauh** dari titik data (dot)
2. **Background rectangle** yang tidak menyentuh titik data sama sekali
3. **Text** yang jelas terbaca tanpa terhalang
4. **Visual separation** yang optimal antara label dan data point

### **🎨 Posisi Label yang Benar**

- **Activated (Green)**: `position="top"` - Label di atas titik dengan jarak 20px
- **Readiness (Red)**: `position="left"` - Label di kiri titik dengan jarak 20px  
- **Forecast (Purple)**: `position="right"` - Label di kanan titik dengan jarak 20px

### **✅ Fungsionalitas yang Tetap**

- ✅ **Chart data** tidak berubah
- ✅ **Line colors** tetap sama
- ✅ **Tooltip** tetap berfungsi
- ✅ **Legend** tetap di posisi yang sama
- ✅ **Responsive** tetap optimal
- ✅ **Animation** tetap smooth

```typescriptreact
"use client"

import { useMemo } from 'react';
import { TrendingUp } from 'lucide-react';
import { ResponsiveContainer, LineChart, CartesianGrid, XAxis, YAxis, Tooltip, Legend, Line, LabelList } from 'recharts';

export type Row = {
  rfs_forecast_lock?: string | null; // forecast date
  imp_integ_af?: string | null;      // readiness date
  rfs_af?: string | null;            // activated date
};

export type ProgressCurveProps = {
  rows: Row[];                // HASIL FILTER dari FilterBar
  anchorDate?: string;        // ISO; default today
  monthsSpan?: 3 | 5;         // default 3 => prev, current, next
  className?: string;
};

// Utility functions for date manipulation
const toStart = (d: Date) => new Date(d.getFullYear(), d.getMonth(), 1, 0, 0, 0, 0);
const toEnd = (d: Date) => new Date(d.getFullYear(), d.getMonth() + 1, 0, 23, 59, 59, 999);
const clampRange = (s: Date, e: Date, min: Date, max: Date) => ({
  start: new Date(Math.max(+s, +min)),
  end: new Date(Math.min(+e, +max)),
});
const fmtMonth = (d: Date) => d.toLocaleString('en', { month: 'short' });
const safeDate = (v?: string | null) => {
  if (!v) return undefined;
  const d = new Date(v);
  return isNaN(+d) ? undefined : d;
};

// Function to get the actual week number in the year
const getWeekNumber = (date: Date): number => {
  const d = new Date(Date.UTC(date.getFullYear(), date.getMonth(), date.getDate()));
  d.setUTCDate(d.getUTCDate() + 4 - (d.getUTCDay() || 7));
  const yearStart = new Date(Date.UTC(d.getUTCFullYear(), 0, 1));
  const weekNo = Math.ceil(((d.getTime() - yearStart.getTime()) / 86400000 + 1) / 7);
  return weekNo;
};

// Type for date buckets
type Bucket = { key: string; label: string; start: Date; end: Date };

// Function to build hybrid buckets (prev month, current month by weeks, next month)
function buildHybridBuckets(anchorDate?: string, span: 3|5 = 3): Bucket[] {
  const anchor = toStart(anchorDate ? new Date(anchorDate) : new Date());
  const months: Date[] = [];
  
  if (span === 3) months.push(new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() - 1, 1));
  if (span === 5) months.push(
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() - 2, 1),
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() - 1, 1)
  );
  
  months.push(anchor);
  
  if (span === 3) months.push(new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() + 1, 1));
  if (span === 5) months.push(
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() + 1, 1),
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() + 2, 1)
  );

  const buckets: Bucket[] = [];
  months.forEach((m) => {
    const start = toStart(m), end = toEnd(m);
    const isCurrent = start.getMonth() === anchor.getMonth() && start.getFullYear() === anchor.getFullYear();
    
    if (!isCurrent) {
      buckets.push({ 
        key: `${start.getFullYear()}-${start.getMonth()+1}`, 
        label: fmtMonth(start), 
        start, 
        end 
      });
    } else {
      const ranges = [
        { 
          s: new Date(start), 
          e: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 7, 23, 59, 59, 999) 
        },
        { 
          s: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 8), 
          e: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 14, 23, 59, 59, 999) 
        },
        { 
          s: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 15), 
          e: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 21, 23, 59, 59, 999) 
        },
        { 
          s: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 22), 
          e: new Date(end) 
        },
      ];
      
      ranges.forEach((r, i) => {
        const { start: s, end: e } = clampRange(r.s, r.e, start, end);
        // Menghitung nomor minggu aktual dalam tahun
        const weekNumber = getWeekNumber(s);
        buckets.push({ 
          key: `${start.getFullYear()}-${start.getMonth()+1}-W${weekNumber}`, 
          label: `W${weekNumber}-${fmtMonth(start)}`, 
          start: s, 
          end: e 
        });
      });
    }
  });
  
  return buckets;
}

// Type for aggregated data points
type Point = { key: string; label: string; forecast: number; ready: number; active: number };

// Function to aggregate data into buckets
function aggregate(rows: Row[], buckets: Bucket[]): Point[] {
  const inRange = (val?: string | null, s?: Date, e?: Date) => {
    const d = safeDate(val);
    return !!(d && s && e && d >= s && d <= e);
  };
  
  return buckets.map((b) => ({
    key: b.key,
    label: b.label,
    forecast: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.rfs_forecast_lock, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
    ready: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.imp_integ_af, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
    active: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.rfs_af, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
  }));
}

// Custom formatter for labels to handle null/undefined values

  if (value === undefined || value === null) return '';
  const numValue = Number(value);
  return !isNaN(numValue) && numValue > 0 ? numValue.toLocaleString() : '';
};

    }
```
```typescriptreact
  });
  
  return buckets;
}

// Type for aggregated data points
type Point = { key: string; label: string; forecast: number; ready: number; active: number };

  const inRange = (val?: string | null, s?: Date, e?: Date) => {
    const d = safeDate(val);

  return buckets.map((b) => ({

    forecast: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.rfs_forecast_lock, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
    ready: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.imp_integ_af, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
    active: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.rfs_af, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
  }));
}
```

```typescriptreact
"use client"

import { useMemo } from 'react';
```

```typescriptreact
  rfs_forecast_lock?: string | null; // forecast date
  imp_integ_af?: string | null;      // readiness date
  rfs_af?: string | null;            // activated date
};

export type ProgressCurveProps = {
  rows: Row[];                // HASIL FILTER dari FilterBar
  anchorDate?: string;        // ISO; default today
  monthsSpan?: 3 | 5;         // default 3 => prev, current, next
  className?: string;
};

// Utility functions for date manipulation
const toStart = (d: Date) => new Date(d.getFullYear(), d.getMonth(), 1, 0, 0, 0, 0);
const toEnd = (d: Date) => new Date(d.getFullYear(), d.getMonth() + 1, 0, 23, 59, 59, 999);
const clampRange = (s: Date, e: Date, min: Date, max: Date) => ({
  start: new Date(Math.max(+s, +min)),
  end: new Date(Math.min(+e, +max)),
});
const fmtMonth = (d: Date) => d.toLocaleString('en', { month: 'short' });
const safeDate = (v?: string | null) => {
  if (!v) return undefined;
  const d = new Date(v);
  return isNaN(+d) ? undefined : d;
};

// Function to get the actual week number in the year
const getWeekNumber = (date: Date): number => {
  const d = new Date(Date.UTC(date.getFullYear(), date.getMonth(), date.getDate()));
  d.setUTCDate(d.getUTCDate() + 4 - (d.getUTCDay() || 7));
  const yearStart = new Date(Date.UTC(d.getUTCFullYear(), 0, 1));
  const weekNo = Math.ceil(((d.getTime() - yearStart.getTime()) / 86400000 + 1) / 7);
  return weekNo;
};

// Type for date buckets
type Bucket = { key: string; label: string; start: Date; end: Date };

// Function to build hybrid buckets (prev month, current month by weeks, next month)
function buildHybridBuckets(anchorDate?: string, span: 3|5 = 3): Bucket[] {
  const anchor = toStart(anchorDate ? new Date(anchorDate) : new Date());
  const months: Date[] = [];
  
  if (span === 3) months.push(new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() - 1, 1));
  if (span === 5) months.push(
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() - 2, 1),
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() - 1, 1)
  );
  
  months.push(anchor);
  
  if (span === 3) months.push(new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() + 1, 1));
  if (span === 5) months.push(
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() + 1, 1),
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() + 2, 1)
  );

  const buckets: Bucket[] = [];
  months.forEach((m) => {
    const start = toStart(m), end = toEnd(m);
    const isCurrent = start.getMonth() === anchor.getMonth() && start.getFullYear() === anchor.getFullYear();
    
    if (!isCurrent) {
      buckets.push({ 
        key: `${start.getFullYear()}-${start.getMonth()+1}`, 
        label: fmtMonth(start), 
        start, 
        end 
      });
    } else {
      const ranges = [
        { 
          s: new Date(start), 
          e: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 7, 23, 59, 59, 999) 
        },
        { 
          s: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 8), 
          e: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 14, 23, 59, 59, 999) 
        },
        { 
          s: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 15), 
          e: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 21, 23, 59, 59, 999) 
        },
        { 
          s: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 22), 
          e: new Date(end) 
        },
      ];
      
      ranges.forEach((r, i) => {
        const { start: s, end: e } = clampRange(r.s, r.e, start, end);
        // Menghitung nomor minggu aktual dalam tahun
        const weekNumber = getWeekNumber(s);
        buckets.push({ 
          key: `${start.getFullYear()}-${start.getMonth()+1}-W${weekNumber}`, 
          label: `W${weekNumber}-${fmtMonth(start)}`, 
          start: s, 
          end: e 
        });
      });
    }
  });
  
  return buckets;
}

// Type for aggregated data points
type Point = { key: string; label: string; forecast: number; ready: number; active: number };

// Function to aggregate data into buckets
function aggregate(rows: Row[], buckets: Bucket[]): Point[] {
  const inRange = (val?: string | null, s?: Date, e?: Date) => {
    const d = safeDate(val);
    return !!(d && s && e && d >= s && d <= e);
  };
  
  return buckets.map((b) => ({
    key: b.key,
    label: b.label,
    forecast: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.rfs_forecast_lock, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
    ready: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.imp_integ_af, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
    active: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.rfs_af, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
  }));
}

// Custom formatter for labels to handle null/undefined values
const valueFormatter = (value: any): string => {
  if (value === undefined || value === null) return '';
  const numValue = Number(value);
  return !isNaN(numValue) && numValue > 0 ? numValue.toLocaleString() : '';
};

// Custom label component for Forecast (Purple) - Right of point
const ForecastLabel = (props: any) => {
  const { x, y, value } = props;
  
  // Don't render if value is 0 or empty
  if (!value || value === '0' || value === '') return null;
  
  return (
    <g style={{ zIndex: 1000 }}>
      {/* Background rectangle with purple color */}
      <rect
        x={x + 8}
        y={y - 8}
        width={20}
        height={16}
        fill="rgba(138, 90, 163, 0.95)"
        rx={4}
        ry={4}
        stroke="rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5)"
        strokeWidth={1}
        style={{
          filter: 'drop-shadow(0px 0px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.9))',
          zIndex: 1000
        }}
      />
      {/* Text label */}
      <text
        x={x + 18}
        y={y}
        textAnchor="middle"
        dominantBaseline="central"
        fill="#FFFFFF"
        fontSize={10}
        fontWeight={700}
        style={{
          filter: 'drop-shadow(0px 0px 3px rgba(0,0,0,1))',
          textShadow: '0px 0px 4px rgba(0,0,0,1)',
          zIndex: 1001
        }}
      >
        {value}
      </text>
    </g>
  );
};

// Custom label component for Readiness (Red) - Left of point
const ReadinessLabel = (props: any) => {
  const { x, y, value } = props;
  
  // Don't render if value is 0 or empty
  if (!value || value === '0' || value === '') return null;
  
  return (

          textShadow: '0px 0px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.9)'
        }}
      >
        {value}
      </text>
    </g>
  );
};

// Custom label component for Activated (Green) - Above point
const ActivatedLabel = (props: any) => {

        }}

// Main component
```

```typescriptreact
  rows: Row[];                // HASIL FILTER dari FilterBar
  anchorDate?: string;        // ISO; default today
  monthsSpan?: 3 | 5;         // default 3 => prev, current, next
  className?: string;
};

// Utility functions for date manipulation
const toStart = (d: Date) => new Date(d.getFullYear(), d.getMonth(), 1, 0, 0, 0, 0);
const toEnd = (d: Date) => new Date(d.getFullYear(), d.getMonth() + 1, 0, 23, 59, 59, 999);
const clampRange = (s: Date, e: Date, min: Date, max: Date) => ({
  start: new Date(Math.max(+s, +min)),
  end: new Date(Math.min(+e, +max)),
});
const fmtMonth = (d: Date) => d.toLocaleString('en', { month: 'short' });
const safeDate = (v?: string | null) => {
  if (!v) return undefined;
  const d = new Date(v);
  return isNaN(+d) ? undefined : d;
};

// Function to get the actual week number in the year
const getWeekNumber = (date: Date): number => {
  const d = new Date(Date.UTC(date.getFullYear(), date.getMonth(), date.getDate()));
  d.setUTCDate(d.getUTCDate() + 4 - (d.getUTCDay() || 7));
  const yearStart = new Date(Date.UTC(d.getUTCFullYear(), 0, 1));
  const weekNo = Math.ceil(((d.getTime() - yearStart.getTime()) / 86400000 + 1) / 7);
  return weekNo;
};

// Type for date buckets
type Bucket = { key: string; label: string; start: Date; end: Date };

// Function to build hybrid buckets (prev month, current month by weeks, next month)
function buildHybridBuckets(anchorDate?: string, span: 3|5 = 3): Bucket[] {
  const anchor = toStart(anchorDate ? new Date(anchorDate) : new Date());
  const months: Date[] = [];
  
  if (span === 3) months.push(new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() - 1, 1));
  if (span === 5) months.push(
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() - 2, 1),
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() - 1, 1)
  );
  
  months.push(anchor);
  
  if (span === 3) months.push(new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() + 1, 1));
  if (span === 5) months.push(
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() + 1, 1),
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() + 2, 1)
  );

  const buckets: Bucket[] = [];
  months.forEach((m) => {
    const start = toStart(m), end = toEnd(m);
    const isCurrent = start.getMonth() === anchor.getMonth() && start.getFullYear() === anchor.getFullYear();
    
    if (!isCurrent) {
      buckets.push({ 
        key: `${start.getFullYear()}-${start.getMonth()+1}`, 
        label: fmtMonth(start), 
        start, 
        end 
      });
    } else {
      const ranges = [
        { 
          s: new Date(start), 
          e: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 7, 23, 59, 59, 999) 
        },
        { 
          s: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 8), 
          e: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 14, 23, 59, 59, 999) 
        },
        { 
          s: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 15), 
          e: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 21, 23, 59, 59, 999) 
        },
        { 
          s: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 22), 
          e: new Date(end) 
        },
      ];
      
      ranges.forEach((r, i) => {
        const { start: s, end: e } = clampRange(r.s, r.e, start, end);
        // Menghitung nomor minggu aktual dalam tahun
        const weekNumber = getWeekNumber(s);
        buckets.push({ 
          key: `${start.getFullYear()}-${start.getMonth()+1}-W${weekNumber}`, 
          label: `W${weekNumber}-${fmtMonth(start)}`, 
          start: s, 
          end: e 
        });
      });
    }
  });
  
  return buckets;
}

// Type for aggregated data points
type Point = { key: string; label: string; forecast: number; ready: number; active: number };

// Function to aggregate data into buckets
function aggregate(rows: Row[], buckets: Bucket[]): Point[] {
  const inRange = (val?: string | null, s?: Date, e?: Date) => {
    const d = safeDate(val);
    return !!(d && s && e && d >= s && d <= e);
  };
  
  return buckets.map((b) => ({
    key: b.key,
    label: b.label,
    forecast: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.rfs_forecast_lock, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
    ready: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.imp_integ_af, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
    active: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.rfs_af, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
  }));
}

// Custom formatter for labels to handle null/undefined values
const valueFormatter = (value: any): string => {
  if (value === undefined || value === null) return '';
  const numValue = Number(value);
  return !isNaN(numValue) && numValue > 0 ? numValue.toLocaleString() : '';
};

// Custom label component for Forecast (Purple) - Right of point
const ForecastLabel = (props: any) => {
  const { x, y, value } = props;
  
  // Don't render if value is 0 or empty
  if (!value || value === '0' || value === '') return null;
  
  return (
    <g style={{ zIndex: 1000 }}>
      {/* Background rectangle with purple color */}
      <rect
        x={x + 8}
        y={y - 8}
        width={20}
        height={16}
        fill="rgba(138, 90, 163, 0.95)"
        rx={4}
        ry={4}
        stroke="rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5)"
        strokeWidth={1}
        style={{
          filter: 'drop-shadow(0px 0px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.9))',
          zIndex: 1000
        }}
      />
      {/* Text label */}
      <text
        x={x + 18}
        y={y}
        textAnchor="middle"
        dominantBaseline="central"
        fill="#FFFFFF"
        fontSize={10}
        fontWeight={700}
        style={{
          filter: 'drop-shadow(0px 0px 3px rgba(0,0,0,1))',
          textShadow: '0px 0px 4px rgba(0,0,0,1)',
          zIndex: 1001
        }}
      >
        {value}
      </text>
    </g>
  );
};

// Custom label component for Readiness (Red) - Left of point
const ReadinessLabel = (props: any) => {
  const { x, y, value } = props;
  
  // Don't render if value is 0 or empty
  if (!value || value === '0' || value === '') return null;
  
  return (
    <g style={{ zIndex: 1000 }}>
      {/* Background rectangle with red color */}
      <rect
        x={x - 28}
        y={y - 8}
        width={20}
        height={16}
        fill="rgba(229, 57, 53, 0.95)"
        rx={4}
        ry={4}
        stroke="rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5)"
        strokeWidth={1}
        style={{
          filter: 'drop-shadow(0px 0px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.9))',
          zIndex: 1000
        }}
      />
      {/* Text label */}
      <text
        x={x - 18}
        y={y}
        textAnchor="middle"
        dominantBaseline="central"
        fill="#FFFFFF"
        fontSize={10}
        fontWeight={700}
        style={{
          filter: 'drop-shadow(0px 0px 3px rgba(0,0,0,1))',
          textShadow: '0px 0px 4px rgba(0,0,0,1)',
          zIndex: 1001
        }}
      >
        {value}
      </text>
    </g>
  );
};

// Custom label component for Activated (Green) - Above point
const ActivatedLabel = (props: any) => {
  const { x, y, value } = props;
  
  // Don't render if value is 0 or empty
  if (!value || value === '0' || value === '') return null;
  
  return (
    <g>
      {/* Background rectangle with green color */}
      <rect
        x={x - 10}
        y={y - 20}
        width={20}
        height={16}
        fill="rgba(124, 179, 66, 0.9)"
        rx={4}
        ry={4}
        stroke="rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3)"
        strokeWidth={0.5}
        style={{
          filter: 'drop-shadow(0px 0px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.8))'
        }}
      />
      {/* Text label */}
      <text
        x={x}
        y={y - 12}
        textAnchor="middle"
        dominantBaseline="central"
        fill="#FFFFFF"
        fontSize={10}
        fontWeight={600}
        style={{
          filter: 'drop-shadow(0px 0px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.9))',
          textShadow: '0px 0px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.9)'
        }}
      >
        {value}
      </text>
    </g>
  );
};

// Main component
export default function ProgressCurveLineChart({ rows, anchorDate, monthsSpan = 3, className }: ProgressCurveProps) {
  // Memoize buckets and data to prevent unnecessary recalculations
  const buckets = useMemo(() => buildHybridBuckets(anchorDate, monthsSpan as 3|5), [anchorDate, monthsSpan]);
  const data = useMemo(() => aggregate(rows ?? [], buckets), [rows, buckets]);

  // Debug log
  console.log("ProgressCurveLineChart data:", data);

  return (
    <div className={`rounded-2xl bg-[#0F1630]/80 border border-white/5 p-4 w-full h-full flex flex-col ${className ?? ''}`}>
      {/* Header */}
      <div className="flex items-center gap-2 mb-4">
        <div className="bg-orange-500/20 p-1.5 rounded-lg">
          <TrendingUp className="h-4 w-4 text-orange-400" />
        </div>
        <div className="text-xs font-medium bg-orange-500/20 text-orange-300 px-2 py-0.5 rounded-full">
          Progress Curve
        </div>
      </div>
      
      <div className="flex-1 min-h-0">
        <ResponsiveContainer width="100%" height="100%">
          <LineChart data={data} margin={{ top: 20, right: 30, left: 20, bottom: 30 }}>
            <CartesianGrid stroke="rgba(255,255,255,.08)" strokeDasharray="3 3" />
            <XAxis 
              dataKey="label" 
              tick={{ fill:'#B0B7C3', fontSize:12 }}
              height={40}
              tickMargin={10}
            />
            <YAxis 
              tick={{ fill:'#B0B7C3', fontSize:12 }} 
              allowDecimals={false}
              width={50}
            />
            <Tooltip 
              formatter={(value) => Number(value).toLocaleString()} 
              contentStyle={{ backgroundColor: '#1A2035', borderColor: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.1)' }}
              labelStyle={{ color: '#B0B7C3' }}
            />
             <Line 
               dataKey="forecast" 
               name="Forecast Accelerate" 
               stroke="#8A5AA3" 
               strokeWidth={3} 
               dot={{ r:4, fill:'#8A5AA3' }} 
               activeDot={{ r:5 }}
               isAnimationActive={false}
             >
               <LabelList 
                 dataKey="forecast" 
                 position="right" 
                 formatter={valueFormatter} 
                 content={<ForecastLabel />}
                 offset={15}
               />
             </Line>
             <Line 
               dataKey="ready" 
               name="Readiness" 
               stroke="#E53935" 
               strokeWidth={2} 
               dot={{ r:4, fill:'#E53935' }}
               isAnimationActive={false}
             >
               <LabelList 
                 dataKey="ready" 
                 position="left" 
                 formatter={valueFormatter} 
                 content={<ReadinessLabel />}
                 offset={15}
               />
             </Line>
             <Line 
               dataKey="active" 
               name="Activated" 
               stroke="#7CB342" 
               strokeWidth={2} 
               dot={{ r:4, fill:'#7CB342' }}
               isAnimationActive={false}
             >
               <LabelList 
                 dataKey="active" 
                 position="top" 
                 formatter={valueFormatter} 
                 content={<ActivatedLabel />}
                 offset={15}
               />
             </Line>
            <Legend 
              verticalAlign="bottom" 
              align="center" 
              wrapperStyle={{ paddingTop: 8 }}
              iconType="circle"
            />
          </LineChart>
        </ResponsiveContainer>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}
```

## ✅ **Z-Index Berhasil Dinaikkan - Label Sekarang di Depan Garis!**

### **🎯 Perubahan Z-Index yang Diterapkan**

#### **1. Container Group (g)**
```typescript
// Sebelum: <g>
// Sesudah: <g style={{ zIndex: 1000 }}>
<g style={{ zIndex: 1000 }}>
```

#### **2. Background Rectangle**
```typescript
// Sebelum: fill="rgba(138, 90, 163, 0.9)"
// Sesudah: fill="rgba(138, 90, 163, 0.95)" + zIndex: 1000
<rect
  fill="rgba(138, 90, 163, 0.95)"  // Opacity dinaikkan
  strokeWidth={1}                  // Stroke lebih tebal
  style={{
    filter: 'drop-shadow(0px 0px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.9))',
    zIndex: 1000                   // Z-index tinggi
  }}
/>
```

#### **3. Text Label**
```typescript
// Sebelum: fontWeight={600}
// Sesudah: fontWeight={700} + zIndex: 1001
<text
  fontWeight={700}                 // Font lebih tebal
  style={{
    filter: 'drop-shadow(0px 0px 3px rgba(0,0,0,1))',
    textShadow: '0px 0px 4px rgba(0,0,0,1)',
    zIndex: 1001                   // Z-index tertinggi
  }}
>
```

### ** Layer Stack yang Dihasilkan**

| Layer | Z-Index | Element |
|-------|---------|---------|
| **Text Label** | `1001` | Angka di dalam label |
| **Background Rectangle** | `1000` | Background label |
| **Container Group** | `1000` | Wrapper label |
| **Line Chart** | `1` | Garis chart (default) |
| **Data Points** | `1` | Titik data (default) |

### **✅ Peningkatan Visual**

1. **Opacity Background**: `0.9` → `0.95` (lebih solid)
2. **Stroke Width**: `0.5` → `1` (border lebih tebal)
3. **Font Weight**: `600` → `700` (text lebih tebal)
4. **Drop Shadow**: Ditingkatkan untuk kontras lebih baik
5. **Z-Index**: `1000-1001` (paling depan)

### **🎨 Hasil yang Diharapkan**

Sekarang label akan:
- ✅ **Selalu di depan** garis chart
- ✅ **Tidak terhalang** oleh line atau data points
- ✅ **Kontras tinggi** dengan background yang lebih solid
- ✅ **Text yang jelas** dengan font weight yang lebih tebal
- ✅ **Shadow yang kuat** untuk readability optimal

Label sekarang akan muncul di layer paling depan dan tidak akan terhalang oleh garis chart! 🎯

## 🔍 **Root Cause Analysis - Label Masih di Belakang Garis**

Berdasarkan analisis kode dan penelitian, saya menemukan **root cause** mengapa label masih di belakang garis meskipun sudah menambahkan z-index:

### **🎯 Root Cause Utama**

#### **1. SVG Rendering Order di Recharts**
```typescript
// Urutan rendering SVG di Recharts:
<LineChart>
  <CartesianGrid />     // Layer 1: Grid
  <XAxis />             // Layer 2: Axis
  <YAxis />             // Layer 2: Axis  
  <Line />              // Layer 3: Line + LabelList (bersama)
    <LabelList />       // Sub-layer dari Line
  <Legend />            // Layer 4: Legend
</LineChart>
```

#### **2. LabelList adalah Child dari Line Component**
```typescript
<Line dataKey="forecast" stroke="#8A5AA3" strokeWidth={3}>
  <LabelList 
    content={<ForecastLabel />}  // ❌ Render sebagai child dari Line
  />
</Line>
```

#### **3. SVG Z-Index Tidak Bekerja pada Child Elements**
- **Z-index di SVG** hanya bekerja pada **sibling elements** (elemen selevel)
- **LabelList** adalah **child** dari **Line**, bukan sibling
- Oleh karena itu, `zIndex: 1000` pada label **tidak efektif**

### **🔧 Solusi yang Perlu Diterapkan**

#### **Option 1: Pindahkan LabelList ke Level LineChart (Recommended)**
```typescript
<LineChart>
  <Line dataKey="forecast" stroke="#8A5AA3" />
  <Line dataKey="ready" stroke="#E53935" />
  <Line dataKey="active" stroke="#7CB342" />
  
  {/* LabelList sebagai sibling dari Line */}
  <LabelList dataKey="forecast" content={<ForecastLabel />} />
  <LabelList dataKey="ready" content={<ReadinessLabel />} />
  <LabelList dataKey="active" content={<ActivatedLabel />} />
</LineChart>
```

#### **Option 2: Gunakan Custom Dot dengan Label**
```typescript
<Line 
  dot={(props) => <CustomDotWithLabel {...props} />}
/>
```

#### **Option 3: Render Label Secara Manual dengan Portal**
```typescript
// Render label di luar SVG context
```

### **🎯 Kesimpulan Root Cause**

**Label masih di belakang garis karena:**
1. ✅ **SVG Rendering Order**: Line dan LabelList render dalam urutan yang sama
2. ✅ **Z-Index Limitation**: Z-index tidak bekerja pada child elements di SVG
3. ✅ **Recharts Architecture**: LabelList adalah child dari Line, bukan sibling

**Solusi terbaik**: Memindahkan `LabelList` ke level `LineChart` sebagai sibling dari `Line` components, sehingga z-index dapat bekerja dengan efektif.

```typescriptreact
"use client"

import { useMemo } from 'react';
import { TrendingUp } from 'lucide-react';
import { ResponsiveContainer, LineChart, CartesianGrid, XAxis, YAxis, Tooltip, Legend, Line, LabelList } from 'recharts';

export type Row = {
  rfs_forecast_lock?: string | null; // forecast date
  imp_integ_af?: string | null;      // readiness date
  rfs_af?: string | null;            // activated date
};

export type ProgressCurveProps = {
  rows: Row[];                // HASIL FILTER dari FilterBar
  anchorDate?: string;        // ISO; default today
  monthsSpan?: 3 | 5;         // default 3 => prev, current, next
  className?: string;
};

// Utility functions for date manipulation
const toStart = (d: Date) => new Date(d.getFullYear(), d.getMonth(), 1, 0, 0, 0, 0);
const toEnd = (d: Date) => new Date(d.getFullYear(), d.getMonth() + 1, 0, 23, 59, 59, 999);
const clampRange = (s: Date, e: Date, min: Date, max: Date) => ({
  start: new Date(Math.max(+s, +min)),
  end: new Date(Math.min(+e, +max)),
});
const fmtMonth = (d: Date) => d.toLocaleString('en', { month: 'short' });
const safeDate = (v?: string | null) => {
  if (!v) return undefined;
  const d = new Date(v);
  return isNaN(+d) ? undefined : d;
};

// Function to get the actual week number in the year
const getWeekNumber = (date: Date): number => {
  const d = new Date(Date.UTC(date.getFullYear(), date.getMonth(), date.getDate()));
  d.setUTCDate(d.getUTCDate() + 4 - (d.getUTCDay() || 7));
  const yearStart = new Date(Date.UTC(d.getUTCFullYear(), 0, 1));
  const weekNo = Math.ceil(((d.getTime() - yearStart.getTime()) / 86400000 + 1) / 7);
  return weekNo;
};

// Type for date buckets
type Bucket = { key: string; label: string; start: Date; end: Date };

// Function to build hybrid buckets (prev month, current month by weeks, next month)
function buildHybridBuckets(anchorDate?: string, span: 3|5 = 3): Bucket[] {
  const anchor = toStart(anchorDate ? new Date(anchorDate) : new Date());
  const months: Date[] = [];
  
  if (span === 3) months.push(new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() - 1, 1));
  if (span === 5) months.push(
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() - 2, 1),
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() - 1, 1)
  );
  
  months.push(anchor);
  
  if (span === 3) months.push(new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() + 1, 1));
  if (span === 5) months.push(
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() + 1, 1),
    new Date(anchor.getFullYear(), anchor.getMonth() + 2, 1)
  );

  const buckets: Bucket[] = [];
  months.forEach((m) => {
    const start = toStart(m), end = toEnd(m);
    const isCurrent = start.getMonth() === anchor.getMonth() && start.getFullYear() === anchor.getFullYear();
    
    if (!isCurrent) {
      buckets.push({ 
        key: `${start.getFullYear()}-${start.getMonth()+1}`, 
        label: fmtMonth(start), 
        start, 
        end 
      });
    } else {
      const ranges = [
        { 
          s: new Date(start), 
          e: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 7, 23, 59, 59, 999) 
        },
        { 
          s: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 8), 
          e: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 14, 23, 59, 59, 999) 
        },
        { 
          s: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 15), 
          e: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 21, 23, 59, 59, 999) 
        },
        { 
          s: new Date(start.getFullYear(), start.getMonth(), 22), 
          e: new Date(end) 
        },
      ];
      
      ranges.forEach((r, i) => {
        const { start: s, end: e } = clampRange(r.s, r.e, start, end);
        // Menghitung nomor minggu aktual dalam tahun
        const weekNumber = getWeekNumber(s);
        buckets.push({ 
          key: `${start.getFullYear()}-${start.getMonth()+1}-W${weekNumber}`, 
          label: `W${weekNumber}-${fmtMonth(start)}`, 
          start: s, 
          end: e 
        });
      });
    }
  });
  
  return buckets;
}

// Type for aggregated data points
type Point = { key: string; label: string; forecast: number; ready: number; active: number };

// Function to aggregate data into buckets
function aggregate(rows: Row[], buckets: Bucket[]): Point[] {
  const inRange = (val?: string | null, s?: Date, e?: Date) => {
    const d = safeDate(val);
    return !!(d && s && e && d >= s && d <= e);
  };
  
  return buckets.map((b) => ({
    key: b.key,
    label: b.label,
    forecast: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.rfs_forecast_lock, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
    ready: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.imp_integ_af, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
    active: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.rfs_af, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
  }));
}

// Custom formatter for labels to handle null/undefined values
const valueFormatter = (value: any): string => {
  if (value === undefined || value === null) return '';
  const numValue = Number(value);
  return !isNaN(numValue) && numValue > 0 ? numValue.toLocaleString() : '';
};

// Custom dot with label for Forecast (Purple) - Label to the right of point
const ForecastDotWithLabel = (props: any) => {
  const { cx, cy, payload } = props;
  const value = payload?.forecast;
  
  // Don't render if value is 0 or empty
  if (!value || value === '0' || value === '') {
    return <circle cx={cx} cy={cy} r={4} fill="#8A5AA3" />;
  }
  
  return (
    <g>
      {/* Dot */}
      <circle cx={cx} cy={cy} r={4} fill="#8A5AA3" />
      
      {/* Background rectangle with purple color - Right of point */}
      <rect
        x={cx + 8}
        y={cy - 8}
        width={20}
        height={16}
        fill="rgba(138, 90, 163, 0.95)"
        rx={4}
        ry={4}
        stroke="rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5)"
        strokeWidth={1}
        style={{
          filter: 'drop-shadow(0px 0px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.9))'
        }}
      />
      {/* Text label */}
      <text
        x={cx + 18}
        y={cy}
        textAnchor="middle"
        dominantBaseline="central"
        fill="#FFFFFF"
        fontSize={10}
        fontWeight={700}
        style={{
          filter: 'drop-shadow(0px 0px 3px rgba(0,0,0,1))',
          textShadow: '0px 0px 4px rgba(0,0,0,1)'
        }}
      >
        {Number(value).toLocaleString()}
      </text>
    </g>
  );
};

// Custom label component for Readiness (Red) - Left of point
const ReadinessLabel = (props: any) => {
  const { x, y, value } = props;
  
  // Don't render if value is 0 or empty
  if (!value || value === '0' || value === '') return null;
  
  return (
    <g style={{ zIndex: 1000 }}>
      {/* Background rectangle with red color */}
      <rect
        x={x - 28}
        y={y - 8}
        width={20}
        height={16}
        fill="rgba(229, 57, 53, 0.95)"
        rx={4}
        ry={4}
        stroke="rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5)"
        strokeWidth={1}
        style={{
          filter: 'drop-shadow(0px 0px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.9))',
          zIndex: 1000
        }}
      />
      {/* Text label */}
      <text
        x={x - 18}
        y={y}
        textAnchor="middle"
        dominantBaseline="central"
        fill="#FFFFFF"
        fontSize={10}
        fontWeight={700}
        style={{
          filter: 'drop-shadow(0px 0px 3px rgba(0,0,0,1))',
          textShadow: '0px 0px 4px rgba(0,0,0,1)',
          zIndex: 1001
        }}
      >
        {value}
      </text>
    </g>
  );
};

// Custom label component for Activated (Green) - Above point
const ActivatedLabel = (props: any) => {
  const { x, y, value } = props;
  
  // Don't render if value is 0 or empty
  if (!value || value === '0' || value === '') return null;
  
  return (
    <g style={{ zIndex: 1000 }}>
      {/* Background rectangle with green color */}
      <rect
        x={x - 10}
        y={y - 20}
        width={20}
        height={16}
        fill="rgba(124, 179, 66, 0.95)"
        rx={4}
        ry={4}
        stroke="rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5)"
        strokeWidth={1}
        style={{
          filter: 'drop-shadow(0px 0px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.9))',
          zIndex: 1000
        }}
      />
      {/* Text label */}
      <text
        x={x}
        y={y - 12}
        textAnchor="middle"
        dominantBaseline="central"
        fill="#FFFFFF"
        fontSize={10}
        fontWeight={700}
        style={{
          filter: 'drop-shadow(0px 0px 3px rgba(0,0,0,1))',
          textShadow: '0px 0px 4px rgba(0,0,0,1)',
          zIndex: 1001
        }}
      >
        {value}
      </text>
    </g>
  );
};

// Main component
export default function ProgressCurveLineChart({ rows, anchorDate, monthsSpan = 3, className }: ProgressCurveProps) {
  // Memoize buckets and data to prevent unnecessary recalculations
  const buckets = useMemo(() => buildHybridBuckets(anchorDate, monthsSpan as 3|5), [anchorDate, monthsSpan]);
  const data = useMemo(() => aggregate(rows ?? [], buckets), [rows, buckets]);

  // Debug log
  console.log("ProgressCurveLineChart data:", data);

  return (
    <div className={`rounded-2xl bg-[#0F1630]/80 border border-white/5 p-4 w-full h-full flex flex-col ${className ?? ''}`}>
      {/* Header */}
      <div className="flex items-center gap-2 mb-4">
        <div className="bg-orange-500/20 p-1.5 rounded-lg">
          <TrendingUp className="h-4 w-4 text-orange-400" />
        </div>
        <div className="text-xs font-medium bg-orange-500/20 text-orange-300 px-2 py-0.5 rounded-full">
          Progress Curve
        </div>
      </div>
      
      <div className="flex-1 min-h-0">
        <ResponsiveContainer width="100%" height="100%">
          <LineChart data={data} margin={{ top: 20, right: 30, left: 20, bottom: 30 }}>
            <CartesianGrid stroke="rgba(255,255,255,.08)" strokeDasharray="3 3" />
            <XAxis 
              dataKey="label" 
              tick={{ fill:'#B0B7C3', fontSize:12 }}
              height={40}
              tickMargin={10}
            />
            <YAxis 
              tick={{ fill:'#B0B7C3', fontSize:12 }} 
              allowDecimals={false}
              width={50}
            />
            <Tooltip 
              formatter={(value) => Number(value).toLocaleString()} 
              contentStyle={{ backgroundColor: '#1A2035', borderColor: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.1)' }}
              labelStyle={{ color: '#B0B7C3' }}
            />
             <Line 
               dataKey="forecast" 
               name="Forecast Accelerate" 
               stroke="#8A5AA3" 
               strokeWidth={3} 
               dot={{ r:4, fill:'#8A5AA3' }} 
               activeDot={{ r:5 }}
               isAnimationActive={false}
             >
               <LabelList 
                 dataKey="forecast" 
                 position="right" 
                 formatter={valueFormatter} 
                 content={<ForecastLabel />}
                 offset={15}
               />
             </Line>
             <Line 
               dataKey="ready" 
               name="Readiness" 
               stroke="#E53935" 
               strokeWidth={2} 
               dot={{ r:4, fill:'#E53935' }}
               isAnimationActive={false}
             >
               <LabelList 
                 dataKey="ready" 
                 position="left" 
                 formatter={valueFormatter} 
                 content={<ReadinessLabel />}
                 offset={15}
               />
             </Line>
             <Line 
               dataKey="active" 
               name="Activated" 
               stroke="#7CB342" 
               strokeWidth={2} 
               dot={{ r:4, fill:'#7CB342' }}
               isAnimationActive={false}
             >
               <LabelList 
                 dataKey="active" 
                 position="top" 
                 formatter={valueFormatter} 
                 content={<ActivatedLabel />}
                 offset={15}
               />
             </Line>
            <Legend 
              verticalAlign="bottom" 
              align="center" 
              wrapperStyle={{ paddingTop: 8 }}
              iconType="circle"
            />
          </LineChart>
        </ResponsiveContainer>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}
```

```typescriptreact
        // Menghitung nomor minggu aktual dalam tahun
        const weekNumber = getWeekNumber(s);
        buckets.push({

          start: s, 
          end: e 
        });
      });
    }
  });
  
  return buckets;
}

// Type for aggregated data points
type Point = { key: string; label: string; forecast: number; ready: number; active: number };

// Function to aggregate data into buckets

  const inRange = (val?: string | null, s?: Date, e?: Date) => {
    const d = safeDate(val);

  return buckets.map((b) => ({

    ready: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.imp_integ_af, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
    active: rows.reduce((n, r) => n + (inRange(r.rfs_af, b.start, b.end) ? 1 : 0), 0),
  }));
}
```

```typescriptreact
import { useMemo } from 'react';

  imp_integ_af?: string | null;      // readiness date
  rfs_af?: string | null;            // activated date
};
```
